name: Taj Mahal, Agra
subtitle: Most Popular
description: Marvel at this UNESCO World Heritage monument, an epitome of love and Mughal architecture.

name: Kerala Backwaters
subtitle: Nature Lovers
description: Experience tranquil houseboat rides through emerald backwaters and lush coconut groves.

name: Goa Beaches
subtitle: Beach Paradise
description: Relax on golden beaches, enjoy vibrant nightlife, and savor delicious seafood.

name: Rajasthan Palaces
subtitle: Royal Heritage
description: Discover royal heritage in majestic palaces, forts, and desert landscapes.

name: Varanasi Ghats
subtitle: Spiritual Hub
description: Witness centuries-old rituals on the banks of the Ganges River in India’s holiest city.

name: Himalayas, Himachal Pradesh
subtitle: Adventure Seekers
description: Trek through the breathtaking Himalayan ranges, with snow-clad peaks and valleys.

name: Amritsar Golden Temple
subtitle: Sacred Landmark
description: Experience peace and devotion at the Golden Temple, a symbol of Sikh spirituality.

name: Mumbai Gateway of India
subtitle: Urban Icon
description: Explore the iconic Gateway of India and Mumbai’s vibrant culture and lifestyle.
